name: Implementing Real-Time Analysis with Hadoop in Azure HDInsight
tagline: Learn how to build low-latency big data solutions
body:
![Implementing Real-Time Analysis with Hadoop in HDInsight](https://webview.edx.org/sites/default/files/styles/course_video_banner/public/course/image/featured-card/dat202.2x-about_page_image-318x210.png)

***

Learn how to implement low-latency and streaming Big Data solutions using Hadoop technologies like HBase, Storm, and Spark on Microsoft Azure HDInsight. Sign up for this free course on [edX](https://www.edx.org/course/implementing-real-time-analytics-hadoop-microsoft-dat202-2x) to learn how to build low-latency big data solutions.
